name: Open source & Design - Victoria Leontieva [fof_athens #5]

Victoria is originated from Ukraine, but she currently lives in Berlin.


She is Sr. Product Designer at GitHub. 


Her areas of focus are product design and design infrastructure. 


As an immigrant and self-taught designer, she shares her experiences as a way to give back to the design community. 


Victoria claims that the design community has undergone a rapid transformation in its recent years. 


The tools and the new ways of working are changing how people design and collaborate. With this shift it's an opportunity to democratise design.


The idea of design open source has been around for a while. But does it live up to our expectations?


In her talk we'll take a detour into the history of open source, and draw parallels and distinctions between open source in software and design. 


Let's have a look at our community's past, its present, and the possibilities for a better future!
